page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Scott Robertson and I am 11 years old. I live in the Managers House at the distillery where my dad is manager. I get out of bed at 8.30a.m and have tea and toast for breakfast. I go to school in the distillery Land Rover. When I get to school I play with the Lego bricks with my friends. When the teacher comes we have a hymn and prayer and then clean our teeth. We do our maths in the morning. At playtime I have crisps and we play British Bulldogs. At 12.30p.m I go home and have my lunch. In the afternoon we do our English. We go home at 3.30p.m and I play with Donna, Stephen and Nicola. I have my tea at 6.00p.m and do my reading when I go to bed at 9.30p.m. My hobbies are reading and working. I have a brother Sean, 14. I have two cats called Splodge and Patch. 0
